sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A triangle has two sides of length 5 cm each. Determine the length of the third side of the equilateral triangle.
message_2: In an equilateral triangle, all three sides have the same length. Since two sides have a length of 5 cm each, the third side must also have a length of 5 cm.
